title: The White Cockatoo
description: When she and her family go through a devastating event, Gwen Wright struggles to repair her chattered world and returned to a state of normal. Her depression makes this no less difficult a task. With her mental state slipping, it is decided she should get a new companion... a pet--a white cockatoo. But when her life begins to slip into chaos once again, the bird takes center stage as the cause.A story of loss and friendship,THE WHITE COCKATOO takes you on a gripping journey through strength, sorrow, betrayal and evil, and pushes one to question the loving relationship between pet and owner.Show More Show Less
author: Michael  Stephenson
